headline: $950 Million Advisor Team Jumps to Raymond James From Ameriprise
summary: Raymond James Financial  has recruited Springs Wealth Group, a large advisory team that previously managed more than $950 million in client assets.  The team will join Raymond James Financial Services, the firm’s independent broker-dealer.  Based in Colorado Springs, Colo. with offices in Texas, Springs Wealth was previously affiliated with  Ameriprise  Financial.
